Author: gcharang#6833
Content: @bknox make sure you are copy pasting the address exactly without missing any characters and that the capital and small letters are preserved

Author: bknox#8456
Content: Yes everything is the way it should be in that respect.

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: @bknox can you send me the address in a DM? I can verify if it is valid

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: @bknox from KomodoOcean to VerusAgama? are both the latest versions?

Author: bknox#8456
Content: Komodo agama to verus agama is what I was trying to do

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: there is no Komodo agama that is currently working, furthermore not recommended for use (daemon is outdated, and Agama versions before 0.5.7 are vulnerable if you missed the news in June),  export your private key from komodo agama, and import into verus agama is what you can do now. reason of the error you get is that you are most likely on a different old chain (before 14th July KMD fork)

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: then send it to a new address from verus agama

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: after that delete komodo agama forever

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: Are you using 12 word seed or native mode?

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: If seed, login with same seed in Verus Agama, but send to different address immediately.

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: If native, click on the 3 dots next to the public address you have in the old wallet

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: Export WIF

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: Then in Verus Agama, Import Key, paste the WIF.

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: you probably need to create a conf file - https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000027990-install-komodo-ocean-wallet-on-windows

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: Please note that Komodo Ocean is Native only, so you'll have to synch the chain which takes a few hours Here's a selction of alternative wallets - https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000027990-install-komodo-ocean-wallet-on-windows
